attributes.action: Demand Boris Johnson & Nigel Farage release their income tax returns.
attributes.background: To ensure we can trust all major players in the EU referendum are honest, the final two should release their details.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. A decision about whether or not to publish their tax return is a decision for an individual to make. 

In any case, Nigel Farage is not a Member of the UK Parliament. Boris Johnson has already released his latest tax returns.
